lead_paragraph: Gunmen shot Zedi Feruzi and his bodyguard in the capital on Saturday. Mr. Feruzi and others have said the president’s plan to run for a third term is unconstitutional.
snippet: Gunmen shot Zedi Feruzi and his bodyguard in the capital on Saturday. Mr. Feruzi and others have said the president’s plan to run for a third term is unconstitutional.
abstract: Anshere Nikoyagize, leader of Burundi's civil society group Ligue Iteka, and residents say that opposition figure Zedi Feruzi and his bodyguard were killed by gunmen; Feruzi and other critics of Pres Pierre Nkurunziza have said his plan to seek third term is unconstitutional.
